Issue.creator: manish-sethi
Issue.summary: Remove hardcoded reference to lscc namespace in collection store
Issue.description: `simpleCollectionStore` (https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/0052b77250c943106673ca69902754ad4a69f824/core/common/privdata/store.go#L51) has assumption in the code about how lscc stores its data. This should be removed by injecting an explicit dependency on `DeployedChaincodeInfoProvider` (https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/0052b77250c943106673ca69902754ad4a69f824/core/ledger/ledger_interface.go#L462)
